Trigger.name: Deathblow
Trigger.script:
if matches[2]:lower() == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Striking like coiled lightning, (you)r hand flashes out and lays open the throat of (.+) with a translucent dagger in a spray of crimson\.$
^Almost too swift to perceive, (\w+) lashes out with a translucent dagger, tracing a bloody line across the throat of (.+)\.$
